help.short: The name of the hybrid machine.
The expand expression to apply on the operation.

command.confirmation: Are you sure you want to perform this operation?

help.short: The name of the hybrid machine.

command.name: create

help.short: The name of the hybrid machine.
Expands referenced resources.
Identity for the resource.
The identity type.
Indicates which kind of Arc machine placement on-premises, such as HCI, SCVMM or VMware etc.
The geo-location where the resource lives
Resource tags.

command.argGroup:
<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.extensions" options="extensions" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.licenseProfile.esuProfile.assignedLicense.properties.licenseDetails.volumeLicenseDetails" options="volume-license-details">

help.short: The name of the hybrid machine.
Identity for the resource.
The identity type.
Indicates which kind of Arc machine placement on-premises, such as HCI, SCVMM or VMware etc.
Resource tags
The info of the machine w.r.t Agent Upgrade
The correlation ID associated with an agent upgrade operation.
Specifies the version info w.r.t AgentUpgrade for the machine.
Specifies if the machine's agent should be upgraded
Metadata pertaining to the geographic location of the resource.
The city or locality where the resource is located.
The country or region where the resource is located
The district, state, or province where the resource is located.
A canonical name for the geographic or physical location.
Specifies the operating system settings for the hybrid machine.
Specifies the linux configuration for update management.
Specifies the windows configuration for update management.
Specifies the patch settings.
Specifies the assessment mode.
Captures the hotpatch capability enrollment intent of the customers, which enables customers to patch their Windows machines without requiring a reboot.
Specifies the patch mode.
The resource id of the parent cluster (Azure HCI) this machine is assigned to, if any.
The resource id of the private link scope this machine is assigned to, if any.
